task_completion.description: The ability to successfully complete the given task

valid_actions.description: Adherence to using the provided available actions

thought_quality.description: The quality and thoroughness of the 'THOUGHT' stage when planning actions

efficiency.description: Completing the task using the least amount of actions without compromising success

communication.description: Clear and correct use of formatting in the 'THOUGHT' and 'ACTION' stages

adaptability.description: The ability to adjust the approach based on environmental feedback

termination_conditions.description: Understanding and following rules regarding the use of 'TERMINATE'
